description: The McLaren 625C, was a variant of the 650S tailored specifically for the Asian market, it offered slightly less power than the 650S but retained similar performance credentials. The 625C featured a revised suspension setup for a smoother ride, targeting buyers who prioritized everyday usability without sacrificing McLaren's trademark driving dynamics. The 625C showcased McLaren's commitment to adapting its supercars to regional preferences while maintaining its performance heritage.
creator: Bnuuy
